question: City Union Bank planed to launch _________ for their customers.
explanation: City Union Bank customers can generate a credit card online for free for its Net banking customers. All that a customer has to do is log on to his/her net banking account and seek a credit card. Only, the customer must have a fixed deposit with the bank. "We will mark a lien on the FD. The customer will be allowed a credit limit of up to 80 per cent of the deposit or a maximum of Rs 3 lakh.
